front.title: Using the International Mobile station Equipment Identity (IMEI) Uniform Resource Name (URN) as an Instance ID

abstract.t: This specification specifies how the Uniform Resource Name (URN) reserved for the GSMA (GSM Association) identities and its sub- namespace for the IMEI (International Mobile station Equipment Identity) can be used as an instance-id. Its purpose is to fulfil the requirements for defining how a specific URN needs to be constructed and used in the "+sip.instance" Contact header field parameter for outbound behavior.
